name: Sparse Mandelbulb Cycles #2/4
description: A series of looped vids made by smoothly interpolating all the points between successive steps along their paths. The seed points are those that enter cycles under the orbit function within 16,384 steps. You can actually stare at a point watch it go through its entire cycle (although there are many exclusive cycles, so a single point will not traverse the entire image). The polar distortion for this object is (r^(-3.8), θ*0.95 φ*1.02). @BruceKnowsHow
